summary: 1 MEDIUM quality concern, 1 LOW semantic inconsistency, 2 verifications (consistent implementation)

issues.title: Silent skip when evidence_service missing - no counter/metric
issues.why: When StoryCreationService encounters a graduated orphan but evidence_service is None, it logs a warning but doesn't increment any counter. Conversations are silently dropped with no metric to detect misconfiguration.
issues.fix: Add a counter like 'conversations_dropped_no_evidence' to ProcessingResult, or ensure evidence_service is always provided when graduated orphans are expected.
issues.verify: Check if pipeline always provides evidence_service to StoryCreationService

issues.title: matched=False for no_evidence_service misrepresents partial success
issues.why: MatchResult returns matched=False for no_evidence_service, but the signature WAS matched - only evidence recording failed. This causes total_processed to not equal sum of specific action counters in OrphanIntegrationResult.
issues.fix: Either add no_evidence_service to counted actions in OrphanIntegrationResult, or change matched=True since signature matching succeeded.
